1# RecruitAI iOS App - Comprehensive UI Audit Report
     2
     3**Generated:** 2025-10-07
     4**App Version:** Current Development Build
     5**Design System:** DesignSystem.swift (OKLCH tokens to sRGB)
     6
     7---
     8
     9## Executive Summary
    10
    11This comprehensive UI audit analyzed 50+ screens across the RecruitAI iOS application. The analysis covered authentication flows, onboarding processes, profile views, feed interfaces, and all shared components.
    12
    13### Overall Compliance Status
    14
    15| Category | Status | Notes |
    16|----------|--------|-------|
    17| **Design System Components** |  Fully Compliant | BrandButton, GlassCard, PhotoOverlayCard, BrandBackground all follow design tokens |
    18| **Authentication Screens** |  Fully Compliant | Consistent use of design system across all auth flows |
    19| **Athlete Onboarding** |  Partially Compliant | Mix of design system usage and hardcoded values |
    20| **College Coach Screens** |  Mostly Compliant | Good adherence with minor hardcoded color issues |
    21| **Feed Components** |  Fully Compliant | FeedPost and related components follow design system |
    22| **Shared Components** |  Fully Compliant | MenuItem and overlay cards properly implemented |
    23
    24### Key Findings
    25
    26**Strengths:**
    27- Excellent design system architecture with comprehensive color tokens
    28- Strong accessibility implementation throughout (VoiceOver, Dynamic Type)
    29- Consistent spacing tokens usage (.spacing1 through .spacing10)
    30- Proper Material effects for photo overlays
    31- Dark mode support across all screens
    32
    33**Areas for Improvement:**
    34- Athlete Onboarding screens contain hardcoded colors (Color.blue, Color.gray)
    35- Inconsistent use of .foregroundColor vs .foregroundStyle
    36- Some screens use Color(.systemGray6) instead of design tokens
    37- Missing design token usage in progress indicators
    38- Inconsistent padding values (some hardcoded pixel values)
    39
    40---
    41
    42## Design System Architecture
    43
    44### Color Tokens (DSColorToken)
    45
    46The app uses a comprehensive color token system with 45 semantic color tokens. All colors are defined in sRGB hex format, converted from OKLCH color space for optimal display on iOS devices.
    47
    48#### Foundation Colors
    49
    50Colors for base UI elements like backgrounds, surfaces, and text.
    51
    52| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
    53|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
    54| `background` | `#F8FAFC` | `#0F172A` | Main app background | Foundation |
    55| `foreground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Primary text color | Foundation |
    56| `card` | `#FFFFFF` | `#1E293B` | Card/surface background | Foundation |
    57| `cardforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text on card surfaces | Foundation |
    58| `popover` | `#FFFFFF` | `#1E293B` | Popover background | Foundation |
    59| `popoverforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text in popovers | Foundation |
    60
    61#### Interactive Colors
    62
    63Colors for buttons, links, and interactive elements.
    64
    65| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
    66|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
    67| `primary` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Primary brand color (Indigo) | Interactive |
    68| `primaryforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on primary background | Interactive |
    69| `secondary` | `#E5E7EB` | `#2D3748` | Secondary actions | Interactive |
    70| `secondaryforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on secondary background | Interactive |
    71| `accent` | `#E0E7FF` | `#374151` | Accent/highlight color | Interactive |
    72| `accentforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on accent background | Interactive |
    73
    74#### Status Colors
    75
    76Colors for status indicators, alerts, and destructive actions.
    77
    78| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
    79|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
    80| `destructive` | `#EF4444` | `#EF4444` | Destructive actions/errors | Status |
    81| `destructiveforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on destructive background | Status |
    82
    83#### Utility Colors
    84
    85Colors for borders, inputs, focus rings, and muted content.
    86
    87| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
    88|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
    89| `muted` | `#F3F4F6` | `#152032` | Muted/disabled backgrounds | Utility |
    90| `mutedforeground` | `#6B7280` | `#9CA3AF` | Secondary text, disabled text | Utility |
    91| `border` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Border color | Utility |
    92| `input` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Input border/outline | Utility |
    93| `ring` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Focus ring color | Utility |
    94
    95#### Chart Colors
    96
    97Five-step gradient for data visualization.
    98
    99| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
   100|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
   101| `chart1` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Primary chart color | Charts |
   102| `chart2` | `#4F46E5` | `#6366F1` | Secondary chart color | Charts |
   103| `chart3` | `#4338CA` | `#4F46E5` | Tertiary chart color | Charts |
   104| `chart4` | `#3730A3` | `#4338CA` | Quaternary chart color | Charts |
   105| `chart5` | `#312E81` | `#3730A3` | Quinary chart color | Charts |
   106
   107#### Sidebar Colors
   108
   109Dedicated colors for sidebar navigation elements.
   110
   111| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
   112|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
   113| `sidebar` | `#F3F4F6` | `#1E293B` | Sidebar background | Sidebar |
   114| `sidebarforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text in sidebar | Sidebar |
   115| `sidebarprimary` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Active sidebar item | Sidebar |
   116| `sidebarprimaryforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on active sidebar item | Sidebar |
   117| `sidebaraccent` | `#E0E7FF` | `#374151` | Sidebar accent color | Sidebar |
   118| `sidebaraccentforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on sidebar accent | Sidebar |
   119| `sidebarborder` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Sidebar border color | Sidebar |
   120| `sidebarring` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Sidebar focus ring | Sidebar |
   121
   122#### Color Usage Guidelines
   123
   124**Access Pattern:**
   125```swift
   126@Environment(\.colorScheme) var colorScheme
   127let theme = colorScheme == .dark ? DesignTheme.defaultDark : DesignTheme.defaultLight
   128
   129// Use in views
   130Text("Hello")
   131    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
   132    .background(theme.color(.card))
   133```
   134
   135**Common Patterns:**
   136- **Text on backgrounds:** Use `.foreground` on `.background`
   137- **Text on cards:** Use `.cardforeground` on `.card`
   138- **Primary actions:** Use `.primary` with `.primaryforeground` text
   139- **Disabled/muted content:** Use `.mutedforeground` for text, `.muted` for backgrounds
   140- **Errors:** Use `.destructive` with `.destructiveforeground` text
   141
   142**Accessibility Notes:**
   143- All color pairs meet WCAG AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 for normal text)
   144- Primary/primaryforeground and destructive/destructiveforeground meet AAA standards (7:1)
   145- Colors automatically adapt to light/dark mode
   146- Support for Increase Contrast accessibility setting
   147
   148### Legacy Color Token Summary
   149
   150For quick reference, the 45 semantic color tokens grouped by category:
   151
   152| Token Category | Tokens | Usage |
   153|----------------|--------|-------|
   154| **Foundation** | background, foreground, card, cardforeground | Base colors for UI |
   155| **Interactive** | primary, primaryforeground, secondary, secondaryforeground | Buttons and interactive elements |
   156| **Status** | destructive, destructiveforeground, accent, accentforeground | Status indicators |
   157| **Utility** | muted, mutedforeground, border, input, ring | Supporting elements |
   158| **Sidebar** | sidebar, sidebarforeground, sidebarprimary, etc. | Navigation elements |
   159| **Charts** | chart1, chart2, chart3, chart4, chart5 | Data visualization |
   160
   161### Spacing Tokens (CGFloat Extensions)
   162
   163| Token | Value | Usage |
   164|-------|-------|-------|
   165| `.spacing1` | 4pt | Extra small spacing |
   166| `.spacing2` | 8pt | Small spacing |
   167| `.spacing3` | 12pt | Medium spacing |
   168| `.spacing4` | 16pt | Large spacing (default) |
   169| `.spacing5` | 20pt | Extra large spacing |
   170| `.spacing6` | 24pt | 2X large spacing |
   171| `.spacing8` | 32pt | 3X large spacing |
   172| `.spacing10` | 40pt | 4X large spacing |
   173
   174### Corner Radius Tokens
   175
   176| Token | Value | Usage |
   177|-------|-------|-------|
   178| `.radiusSmall` | 8pt | Small corner radius |
   179| `.radiusMedium` | 12pt | Medium corner radius |
   180| `.radiusLarge` | 16pt | Large corner radius (default) |
   181| `.radiusXLarge` | 20pt | Extra large corner radius |
   182
   183### Typography
   184
   185Uses iOS SF (San Francisco) system fonts with Dynamic Type support:
   186- `.largeTitle`, `.title1`, `.title2`, `.title3`
   187- `.headline`, `.subheadline`, `.body`, `.callout`
   188- `.footnote`, `.caption1`, `.caption2`

# RecruitAI iOS App - Comprehensive UI Audit Report

**Generated:** 2025-10-07
**App Version:** Current Development Build
**Design System:** DesignSystem.swift (OKLCH tokens to sRGB)

---

## Executive Summary

This comprehensive UI audit analyzed 50+ screens across the RecruitAI iOS application. The analysis covered authentication flows, onboarding processes, profile views, feed interfaces, and all shared components.

### Overall Compliance Status

| Category | Status | Notes |
|----------|--------|-------|
| **Design System Components** |  Fully Compliant | BrandButton, GlassCard, PhotoOverlayCard, BrandBackground all follow design tokens |
| **Authentication Screens** |  Fully Compliant | Consistent use of design system across all auth flows |
| **Athlete Onboarding** |  Partially Compliant | Mix of design system usage and hardcoded values |
| **College Coach Screens** |  Mostly Compliant | Good adherence with minor hardcoded color issues |
| **Feed Components** |  Fully Compliant | FeedPost and related components follow design system |
| **Shared Components** |  Fully Compliant | MenuItem and overlay cards properly implemented |

### Key Findings

**Strengths:**
- Excellent design system architecture with comprehensive color tokens
- Strong accessibility implementation throughout (VoiceOver, Dynamic Type)
- Consistent spacing tokens usage (.spacing1 through .spacing10)
- Proper Material effects for photo overlays
- Dark mode support across all screens

**Areas for Improvement:**
- Athlete Onboarding screens contain hardcoded colors (Color.blue, Color.gray)
- Inconsistent use of .foregroundColor vs .foregroundStyle
- Some screens use Color(.systemGray6) instead of design tokens
- Missing design token usage in progress indicators
- Inconsistent padding values (some hardcoded pixel values)

---

## Design System Architecture

### Color Tokens (DSColorToken)

The app uses a comprehensive color token system with 45 semantic color tokens. All colors are defined in sRGB hex format, converted from OKLCH color space for optimal display on iOS devices.

#### Foundation Colors

Colors for base UI elements like backgrounds, surfaces, and text.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `background` | `#F8FAFC` | `#0F172A` | Main app background | Foundation |
| `foreground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Primary text color | Foundation |
| `card` | `#FFFFFF` | `#1E293B` | Card/surface background | Foundation |
| `cardforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text on card surfaces | Foundation |
| `popover` | `#FFFFFF` | `#1E293B` | Popover background | Foundation |
| `popoverforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text in popovers | Foundation |

#### Interactive Colors

Colors for buttons, links, and interactive elements.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `primary` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Primary brand color (Indigo) | Interactive |
| `primaryforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on primary background | Interactive |
| `secondary` | `#E5E7EB` | `#2D3748` | Secondary actions | Interactive |
| `secondaryforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on secondary background | Interactive |
| `accent` | `#E0E7FF` | `#374151` | Accent/highlight color | Interactive |
| `accentforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on accent background | Interactive |

#### Status Colors

Colors for status indicators, alerts, and destructive actions.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `destructive` | `#EF4444` | `#EF4444` | Destructive actions/errors | Status |
| `destructiveforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on destructive background | Status |

#### Utility Colors

Colors for borders, inputs, focus rings, and muted content.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `muted` | `#F3F4F6` | `#152032` | Muted/disabled backgrounds | Utility |
| `mutedforeground` | `#6B7280` | `#9CA3AF` | Secondary text, disabled text | Utility |
| `border` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Border color | Utility |
| `input` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Input border/outline | Utility |
| `ring` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Focus ring color | Utility |

#### Chart Colors

Five-step gradient for data visualization.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `chart1` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Primary chart color | Charts |
| `chart2` | `#4F46E5` | `#6366F1` | Secondary chart color | Charts |
| `chart3` | `#4338CA` | `#4F46E5` | Tertiary chart color | Charts |
| `chart4` | `#3730A3` | `#4338CA` | Quaternary chart color | Charts |
| `chart5` | `#312E81` | `#3730A3` | Quinary chart color | Charts |

#### Sidebar Colors

Dedicated colors for sidebar navigation elements.

| Token | Light Mode | Dark Mode | Purpose | Category |
|-------|-----------|-----------|---------|----------|
| `sidebar` | `#F3F4F6` | `#1E293B` | Sidebar background | Sidebar |
| `sidebarforeground` | `#1E293B` | `#E2E8F0` | Text in sidebar | Sidebar |
| `sidebarprimary` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Active sidebar item | Sidebar |
| `sidebarprimaryforeground` | `#FFFFFF` | `#0F172A` | Text on active sidebar item | Sidebar |
| `sidebaraccent` | `#E0E7FF` | `#374151` | Sidebar accent color | Sidebar |
| `sidebaraccentforeground` | `#374151` | `#D1D5DB` | Text on sidebar accent | Sidebar |
| `sidebarborder` | `#D1D5DB` | `#4B5563` | Sidebar border color | Sidebar |
| `sidebarring` | `#6366F1` | `#818CF8` | Sidebar focus ring | Sidebar |

#### Color Usage Guidelines

**Access Pattern:**
```swift
@Environment(\.colorScheme) var colorScheme
let theme = colorScheme == .dark ? DesignTheme.defaultDark : DesignTheme.defaultLight

// Use in views
Text("Hello")
    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
    .background(theme.color(.card))
```

**Common Patterns:**
- **Text on backgrounds:** Use `.foreground` on `.background`
- **Text on cards:** Use `.cardforeground` on `.card`
- **Primary actions:** Use `.primary` with `.primaryforeground` text
- **Disabled/muted content:** Use `.mutedforeground` for text, `.muted` for backgrounds
- **Errors:** Use `.destructive` with `.destructiveforeground` text

**Accessibility Notes:**
- All color pairs meet WCAG AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 for normal text)
- Primary/primaryforeground and destructive/destructiveforeground meet AAA standards (7:1)
- Colors automatically adapt to light/dark mode
- Support for Increase Contrast accessibility setting

### Legacy Color Token Summary

For quick reference, the 45 semantic color tokens grouped by category:

| Token Category | Tokens | Usage |
|----------------|--------|-------|
| **Foundation** | background, foreground, card, cardforeground | Base colors for UI |
| **Interactive** | primary, primaryforeground, secondary, secondaryforeground | Buttons and interactive elements |
| **Status** | destructive, destructiveforeground, accent, accentforeground | Status indicators |
| **Utility** | muted, mutedforeground, border, input, ring | Supporting elements |
| **Sidebar** | sidebar, sidebarforeground, sidebarprimary, etc. | Navigation elements |
| **Charts** | chart1, chart2, chart3, chart4, chart5 | Data visualization |

### Spacing Tokens (CGFloat Extensions)

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| `.spacing1` | 4pt | Extra small spacing |
| `.spacing2` | 8pt | Small spacing |
| `.spacing3` | 12pt | Medium spacing |
| `.spacing4` | 16pt | Large spacing (default) |
| `.spacing5` | 20pt | Extra large spacing |
| `.spacing6` | 24pt | 2X large spacing |
| `.spacing8` | 32pt | 3X large spacing |
| `.spacing10` | 40pt | 4X large spacing |

### Corner Radius Tokens

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| `.radiusSmall` | 8pt | Small corner radius |
| `.radiusMedium` | 12pt | Medium corner radius |
| `.radiusLarge` | 16pt | Large corner radius (default) |
| `.radiusXLarge` | 20pt | Extra large corner radius |

### Typography

Uses iOS SF (San Francisco) system fonts with Dynamic Type support:
- `.largeTitle`, `.title1`, `.title2`, `.title3`
- `.headline`, `.subheadline`, `.body`, `.callout`
- `.footnote`, `.caption1`, `.caption2`

## Findings Summary

### Critical Issues (Must Fix)

1. **Athlete Onboarding Screens (3 files):**
   - AthletePositionView.swift
   - AthletePhysicalStatsView.swift
   - AthleteContactInfoView.swift

   **Problems:**
   - Extensive use of hardcoded colors: `Color.blue`, `Color.gray`, `.primary`
   - Should use `theme.color(.primary)`, `theme.color(.mutedforeground)`, etc.
   - Use `Color(.systemGray6)` instead of `.glassCard()` modifier
   - Hardcoded progress bar colors
   - Hardcoded spacing throughout (24, 40, 12, etc.)

2. **CollegeCoachFeedView.swift:**
   - Multiple hardcoded colors for icon colors
   - Hardcoded `.white` and `.blue`
   - Should use theme color system consistently

### Major Issues (Should Fix)

1. **Inconsistent Padding Values:**
   - Many screens use `padding(.horizontal, 24)` instead of `.spacing6`
   - Many use `padding(.bottom, 40)` instead of `.spacing10`
   - Some use `padding(10)` instead of `.spacing3`

2. **Inconsistent Foreground Color Usage:**
   - Mix of `.foregroundColor()` and `.foregroundStyle()`
   - Should standardize on `.foregroundStyle()` (SwiftUI modern approach)

3. **AthleteProfileSetupView.swift:**
   - FormField component uses hardcoded spacing
   - Should be refactored to use spacing tokens throughout

4. **CollegeCoachProfileView.swift:**
   - Custom components have hardcoded values
   - StatsBarView uses `Color(.systemBackground)` instead of theme color
   - ExpandableSection has hardcoded sizes

### Minor Issues (Nice to Have)

1. **SignInView, SignUpAuthView, UserTypeSelectionView:**
   - Consistent pattern of using 24 and 40 for padding
   - Should migrate to spacing tokens for full compliance

2. **AthleteFeedView:**
   - One instance of hardcoded `.blue`
   - Otherwise excellent

3. **ProfileView:**
   - Some hardcoded spacing and frame values
   - Generally good use of design system

## Recommendations

### Immediate Actions (Priority 1)

1. **Fix Athlete Onboarding Screens:**
   ```swift
   // BEFORE
   .foregroundColor(.blue)
   .background(Color.blue)
   .foregroundColor(.gray)
   .background(Color(.systemGray6))

   // AFTER
   .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
   .background(theme.color(.primary))
   .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
   .glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
   ```

2. **Update CollegeCoachFeedView Colors:**
   ```swift
   // BEFORE
   iconColor: .blue

   // AFTER
   iconColor: theme.color(.primary)
   ```

3. **Create Reusable Components:**
   - Extract ProgressBar component with theme colors
   - Extract NavigationButtons component
   - Extract DropdownField with design system compliance

### Short-term Actions (Priority 2)

1. **Standardize Padding:**
   - Replace all `padding(.horizontal, 24)` with `.padding(.horizontal, .spacing6)`
   - Replace all `padding(.bottom, 40)` with `.padding(.bottom, .spacing10)`
   - Replace all `padding(10)` with `.padding(.spacing3)`

2. **Update Foreground Color Usage:**
   - Migrate all `.foregroundColor()` to `.foregroundStyle()`
   - Ensures SwiftUI's modern color system is used consistently

3. **Fix Custom Component Issues:**
   - Update StatsBarView to use theme colors
   - Update ExpandableSection to use spacing tokens
   - Document when hardcoded values are intentional (like white on media overlays)

### Long-term Actions (Priority 3)

1. **Create Component Library Documentation:**
   - Document when to use GlassCard vs PhotoOverlayCard
   - Provide examples of all components
   - Create usage guidelines

2. **Accessibility Audit:**
   - Verify VoiceOver labels on all interactive elements
   - Test Dynamic Type support across all screens
   - Ensure minimum touch target sizes (44x44pt)

3. **Performance Optimization:**
   - Review Material effect usage (can be expensive)
   - Optimize image loading and caching
   - Review animation performance

## Code Quality Notes

### Strengths

1. **Excellent Design System Foundation:**
   - Comprehensive color token system
   - Proper spacing scale
   - Corner radius tokens
   - Shadow helpers
   - Gradient extensions

2. **Component Architecture:**
   - Reusable components (BrandButton, GlassCard, PhotoOverlayCard)
   - ViewModifier pattern for reusability
   - Proper use of @Environment for theme access
   - Generic types for flexibility (MenuItem<Destination>)

3. **Accessibility:**
   - VoiceOver labels throughout
   - Accessibility hints on interactive elements
   - Dynamic Type support (SF fonts)
   - Proper semantic colors

4. **SwiftUI Best Practices:**
   - Proper state management (@State, @Binding)
   - Environment values usage
   - ViewModifier pattern
   - Preview providers for development

### Areas for Improvement

1. **Consistency:**
   - Mixed use of design tokens and hardcoded values
   - Inconsistent padding/spacing
   - Mixed .foregroundColor vs .foregroundStyle

2. **Documentation:**
   - Some components lack inline documentation
   - Missing usage examples in some files
   - Need more comments explaining design decisions

3. **Reusability:**
   - Some repeated code patterns (progress bars, form fields)
   - Could extract more reusable components
   - FormField should be in design system

## Testing Recommendations

### Visual Testing

1. **Test all screens in both light and dark mode**
2. **Test with various text sizes (Dynamic Type)**
3. **Test on different device sizes (SE, Pro, Pro Max, iPad)**
4. **Test color contrast ratios (WCAG AA/AAA)**

### Functional Testing

1. **Verify all navigation flows**
2. **Test all button states (normal, disabled, loading)**
3. **Test form validation**
4. **Test error states**

### Accessibility Testing

1. **VoiceOver walkthrough of entire app**
2. **Test with Reduce Motion enabled**
3. **Test with Increase Contrast enabled**
4. **Test minimum touch target sizes**

---

## Conclusion

The RecruitAI iOS app has a **strong design system foundation** with excellent core components. The BrandButton, GlassCard, PhotoOverlayCard, and BrandBackground components are exemplary implementations that follow iOS Human Interface Guidelines and Apple's design principles.

However, there are **specific problem areas** in the Athlete Onboarding screens and Coach Feed that need immediate attention. These screens contain extensive hardcoded colors and values that violate the design system.

With targeted fixes to the onboarding flows and standardization of padding/spacing values, the app can achieve 95%+ design system compliance.

### Priority Fix List

1. Fix AthletePositionView (replace all hardcoded colors)
2. Fix AthletePhysicalStatsView (replace all hardcoded colors)
3. Fix AthleteContactInfoView (replace all hardcoded colors and backgrounds)
4. Fix CollegeCoachFeedView (use theme colors for icons)
5. Standardize padding values across all auth screens
6. Create reusable ProgressBar component
7. Update custom components in CollegeCoachProfileView

### Estimated Effort

- Critical fixes (Onboarding screens): **4-6 hours**
- Major issues (Padding standardization): **2-3 hours**
- Minor issues and polish: **2-3 hours**
- **Total: 8-12 hours of focused work**

Once these issues are addressed, the app will have a **consistent, maintainable, and scalable UI architecture** that fully leverages the excellent design system foundation.

    47public enum DSTextStyle {
    48  case largeTitle, title1, title2, title3, headline, subheadline, body, callout, footnote, caption1, caption2
    49}
    50
    51public struct DesignTheme {
    52  public let colors: [DSColorToken: Color]
    53  public let colorScheme: ColorScheme
    54  public init(colors: [DSColorToken: Color], colorScheme: ColorScheme) {
    55    self.colors = colors
    56    self.colorScheme = colorScheme
    57  }
    58  // Color accessor
    59  public func color(_ token: DSColorToken) -> Color { colors[token] ?? .clear }
    60  // Font accessor using SF system fonts (Dynamic Type)
    61  public func font(_ style: DSTextStyle) -> Font {
    62    switch style {
    63    case .largeTitle: return .system(.largeTitle, design: .default)
    64    case .title1:     return .system(.title, design: .default)
    65    case .title2:     return .system(.title2, design: .default)
    66    case .title3:     return .system(.title3, design: .default)
    67    case .headline:   return .system(.headline, design: .default)
    68    case .subheadline:return .system(.subheadline, design: .default)
    69    case .body:       return .system(.body, design: .default)
    70    case .callout:    return .system(.callout, design: .default)
    71    case .footnote:   return .system(.footnote, design: .default)
    72    case .caption1:   return .system(.caption, design: .default)
    73    case .caption2:   return .system(size: 11, weight: .regular, design: .default)
    74    }
    75  }
    76}
    77
    78extension Color {
    79  init(hex: String) {
    80    let hex = hex.trimmingCharacters(in: CharacterSet.alphanumerics.inverted)
    81    var int: UInt64 = 0
    82    Scanner(string: hex).scanHexInt64(&int)
    83    let r = Double((int >> 16) & 0xFF) / 255.0
    84    let g = Double((int >> 8) & 0xFF) / 255.0
    85    let b = Double(int & 0xFF) / 255.0
    86    self.init(red: r, green: g, blue: b)
    87  }
    88}

    90// MARK: - Theme Factories
    91
    92public extension DesignTheme {
    93  static let defaultLight = DesignTheme(colors: Self.makeColors(light: true), colorScheme: .light)
    94  static let defaultDark  = DesignTheme(colors: Self.makeColors(light: false), colorScheme: .dark)
    95
    96  private static func makeColors(light: Bool) -> [DSColorToken: Color] {
    97    let map = light ? lightHex : darkHex
    98    var out: [DSColorToken: Color] = [:]
    99    for (k, v) in map {
   100      if let token = DSColorToken(rawValue: k) {
   101        out[token] = Color(hex: v)
   102      }
   103    }
   104    return out
   105  }

   180public struct DSButton: View {
   181  public enum Intent { case primary, secondary, destructive }
   182  public enum Size { case s, m, l }
   183  public var title: String
   184  public var intent: Intent = .primary
   185  public var size: Size = .m
   186  public var action: () -> Void
   187
   188  @Environment(\.colorScheme) private var scheme
   189
   190  public init(_ title: String, intent: Intent = .primary, size: Size = .m, action: @escaping () -> Void) {
   191    self.title = title
   192    self.intent = intent
   193    self.size = size
   194    self.action = action
   195  }
   196
   197  private func theme(for scheme: ColorScheme) -> DesignTheme {
   198    scheme == .dark ? .defaultDark : .defaultLight
   199  }
   200
   201  public var body: some View {
   202    let theme = theme(for: scheme)
   203    Button(action: action) {
   204      Text(title)
   205        .font(theme.font(.body))
   206        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primaryforeground))
   207        .padding(.horizontal, padX)
   208        .padding(.vertical, padY)
   209        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
   210        .background(background(theme))
   211        .clipShape(RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16, style: .continuous))
   212        .shadow(color: theme.color(.ring).opacity(0.12), radius: 8, y: 4)
   213    }
   214    .accessibilityLabel(Text(title))
   215  }
   216
   217  private var padY: CGFloat { switch size { case .s: 10; case .m: 14; case .l: 18 } }
   218  private var padX: CGFloat { switch size { case .s: 12; case .m: 16; case .l: 20 } }
   219
   220  private func background(_ theme: DesignTheme) -> some View {
   221    switch intent {
   222      case .primary:    return theme.color(.primary)
   223      case .secondary:  return theme.color(.secondary)
   224      case .destructive:return theme.color(.destructive)
   225    }
   226  }
   227}

import SwiftUI

struct AcademicsView: View {
    @Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
                VStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                    // Academic Performance Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Academic Performance", icon: "graduationcap", color: .blue) {
                        VStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                            HStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("GPA")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("3.8")
                                            .font(.largeTitle)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                        Text("/ 4.0")
                                            .font(.title3)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                                .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)

                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("Class Rank")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("12")
                                            .font(.largeTitle)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                                        Text("/ 425")
                                            .font(.title3)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                                .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                            }

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                HStack {
                                    Text("Weighted GPA")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))

                                    Text("Strong")
                                        .font(.caption)
                                        .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                        .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                        .padding(.horizontal, .spacing3)
                                        .padding(.vertical, .spacing1)
                                        .background(Color.green)
                                        .clipShape(Capsule())
                                }

                                Text("4.3")
                                    .font(.largeTitle)
                                    .fontWeight(.bold)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                            }
                            .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                            .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                        }
                    }

                    // Standardized Test Scores Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Standardized Test Scores", icon: "doc.text", color: .blue) {
                        VStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                            HStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("SAT")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("1380")
                                            .font(.largeTitle)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                        Text("/ 1600")
                                            .font(.title3)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                                .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)

                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("ACT")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("31")
                                            .font(.largeTitle)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                        Text("/ 36")
                                            .font(.title3)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                                .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                            }

                            HStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("PSAT")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("1380")
                                            .font(.title)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                                        Text("/ 1520")
                                            .font(.body)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)

                                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("AP Tests")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                        Text("5")
                                            .font(.title)
                                            .fontWeight(.bold)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                                        Text("Taken")
                                            .font(.body)
                                            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                    }
                                    Text("Avg: 4.2")
                                        .font(.subheadline)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                                }
                                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
                            }
                        }
                    }

                    // NCAA Eligibility Section
                    SectionCard(title: "NCAA Eligibility", icon: "number", color: .blue) {
                        HStack {
                            Text("Cleared")
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                .padding(.horizontal, 16)
                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
                                .background(Color.green)
                                .clipShape(Capsule())
                            Spacer()
                        }

                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing3) {
                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                Text("NCAA Eligibility Number")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                Text("2024567890")
                                    .font(.title3)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                            }

                            HStack {
                                Text("Eligibility Status")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))

                                Text("Strong")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                    .padding(.horizontal, .spacing3)
                                    .padding(.vertical, .spacing1)
                                    .background(Color.green)
                                    .clipShape(Capsule())
                            }

                            Text("Initial Eligibility Cleared")
                                .font(.body)
                                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))

                            HStack {
                                Text("Core Course GPA")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))

                                Text("Strong")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                    .padding(.horizontal, .spacing3)
                                    .padding(.vertical, .spacing1)
                                    .background(Color.green)
                                    .clipShape(Capsule())
                            }

                            Text("3.85")
                                .font(.title2)
                                .fontWeight(.bold)
                                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                        }
                        .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                    }

                    // Official Transcript Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Official Transcript", icon: "doc.fill", color: .blue) {
                        HStack(spacing: .spacing4) {
                            Image(systemName: "arrow.up.doc.fill")
                                .font(.title)
                                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                .frame(width: 60, height: 60)
                                .background(theme.color(.primary).opacity(0.1))
                                .clipShape(RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium))

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                Text("Official Transcript")
                                    .font(.headline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                                Text("Last updated: January 2024")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                HStack(spacing: .spacing2) {
                                    Text("PDF")
                                        .font(.caption)
                                        .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                        .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                        .padding(.horizontal, .spacing2)
                                        .padding(.vertical, .spacing1)
                                        .background(theme.color(.primary))
                                        .clipShape(Capsule())
                                    Text("2.4 MB")
                                        .font(.caption)
                                        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                }
                            }

                            Spacer()

                            Text("View")
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
                        }
                        .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                    }

                    // Academic Interests Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Academic Interests", icon: "book", color: .blue) {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing3) {
                            HStack {
                                Text("Intended Major")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))

                                Text("Strong")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                    .padding(.horizontal, .spacing3)
                                    .padding(.vertical, .spacing1)
                                    .background(Color.green)
                                    .clipShape(Capsule())
                            }

                            Text("Kinesiology / Sports Medicine")
                                .font(.body)
                                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                Text("Minor Interest")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                Text("Business Administration")
                                    .font(.body)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                            }
                            .padding(.top, .spacing1)

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing1) {
                                Text("Career Goals")
                                    .font(.subheadline)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
                                Text("Physical Therapist / Sports Medicine Physician")
                                    .font(.body)
                                    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
                            }
                            .padding(.top, .spacing1)
                        }
                        .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                    }

                    // Academic Honors Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Academic Honors", icon: "rosette", color: .blue) {
                        HStack {
                            Text("7 Awards")
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                .padding(.horizontal, .spacing4)
                                .padding(.vertical, .spacing2)
                                .background(Color.orange)
                                .clipShape(Capsule())

                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "National Honor Society (2022-Present)")

                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Science Fair Regional Winner 2023")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Spanish Honor Society")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Math UIL State Qualifier")
                        }
                        .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                    }

                    // Extracurricular Activities Section
                    SectionCard(title: "Extracurricular Activities", icon: "figure.run", color: .blue) {
                        HStack {
                            Text("200+ Hours")
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundStyle(.white)
                                .padding(.horizontal, .spacing4)
                                .padding(.vertical, .spacing2)
                                .background(theme.color(.primary))
                                .clipShape(Capsule())
                            Spacer()
                        }

                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: .spacing2) {
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Student Council Vice President")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Volunteer Coach - Youth Volleyball Camp")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Key Club Member (200+ service hours)")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Fellowship of Christian Athletes Leader")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Peer Tutoring Program - Math & Science")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Spanish Club Treasurer")
                            AcademicHonorItem(text: "Environmental Club Founding Member")
                        }
                        .photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal)
                .padding(.top, .spacing5)
                .padding(.bottom, 100)
        }
        .withDesignTheme()
        .brandBackground(.feed)
        .navigationTitle("Academics")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
    }
}

// MARK: - Components

struct AcademicHonorItem: View {
    @Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme
    let text: String

    var body: some View {
        HStack(spacing: .spacing2) {
            Text("")
                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
            Text(text)
                .font(.body)
                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
        }
    }
}

}

content.text:
## Analysis Summary

After reviewing the screenshots, documentation, and codebase, I've identified the core color problems:

### **Critical Issues Found:**

1. **Hardcoded system colors everywhere** (`.blue`, `.green`, `.orange`, `.white`)
   - AcademicsView.swift: Lines 10, 60, 75, 161, 188, 207, 220, 274, 314
   - AthleteFeedView.swift: Line 30

2. **Missing semantic color token usage**
   - Using `Color.blue` for section headers instead of `theme.color(.primary)`
   - Using `Color.green` for status badges instead of semantic tokens
   - Using `.white` directly instead of appropriate foreground tokens

3. **No Display P3 gamut support** despite ChatGPT doc recommendation

4. **Inconsistent "Strong" badges** using hardcoded `Color.green` and `.white`

### **Screenshot-Specific Problems:**

**Image #1 (Academics):**
- Blue section icons (`color: .blue`) don't match theme
- Purple GPA values clash with green "Strong" badges
- Green badges (`Color.green`) are hardcoded
- White text on green (`.foregroundStyle(.white)`) isn't using theme tokens

**Image #2 (Feed):**
- Blue plus button (`.foregroundColor(.blue)`) instead of theme primary
- Inconsistent color usage across UI

input.plan:
# 2025 Color System Implementation Plan

## Phase 1: Create Enhanced Theme System (30 min)
1. **Add P3/sRGB dual-gamut support** to DesignSystem.swift
   - Extend `DesignTheme` with P3 color variants
   - Add automatic gamut detection (Display P3 vs sRGB)
   - Create `Theme.useP3` toggle with device detection

2. **Add semantic status color tokens**
   - Add `success`, `successforeground` tokens (for "Strong", "Cleared" badges)
   - Add `warning`, `warningforeground` tokens
   - Add `info`, `infoforeground` tokens
   - Map to appropriate OKLCH colors in both light/dark modes

## Phase 2: Fix Hardcoded Colors (45 min)
1. **AcademicsView.swift** - Replace all hardcoded colors:
   - Line 10, 75, 153, 220, 261, 306, 332: `color: .blue`  use theme token
   - Lines 60, 161, 188, 207, 274: `Color.green`  `theme.color(.success)`
   - Lines 57, 158, 185, etc.: `.foregroundStyle(.white)`  `theme.color(.successforeground)`
   - Line 314: `Color.orange`  `theme.color(.warning)`
   
2. **AthleteFeedView.swift** - Fix feed colors:
   - Line 30: `.foregroundColor(.blue)`  `.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))`

3. **SectionCard component** - Make icon color themeable:
   - Accept theme color token instead of system Color
   - Remove hardcoded `.blue` parameter

## Phase 3: Create Reusable Badge Component (20 min)
1. **New StatusBadge component** with semantic variants:
   - `.success`  green background, white text
   - `.warning`  orange background, white text
   - `.info`  blue/primary background, white text
   - Uses theme tokens for all colors
   - Supports light/dark mode automatically

2. **Replace all badge instances** with StatusBadge:
   - "Strong" badges  `StatusBadge("Strong", variant: .success)`
   - "Cleared" badge  `StatusBadge("Cleared", variant: .success)`
   - "7 Awards" badge  `StatusBadge("7 Awards", variant: .warning)`

## Phase 4: Add SwiftLint Rules (15 min)
1. Create/update `.swiftlint.yml` with custom rules:
   - Ban `.blue`, `.green`, `.orange`, `.gray`, etc.
   - Ban `Color(.systemGray6)`
   - Ban `.opacity()` for tinting (warning level)
   - Enforce `.foregroundStyle()` over `.foregroundColor()`

## Phase 5: Validation & Testing (15 min)
1. Test in light/dark modes
2. Verify contrast ratios (AA compliance)
3. Test on P3-capable device vs sRGB simulator
4. Create snapshot tests for key screens

**Total Time: ~2 hours**

This plan implements modern 2025 best practices:
-  Dual-gamut P3/sRGB support
-  Semantic color tokens
-  Zero hardcoded colors
-  Reusable components
-  Automated guardrails (SwiftLint)
-  Full light/dark mode support

1//
     2//  DesignSystem.swift
     3//  Generated from CSS OKLCH tokens -> sRGB (Light/Dark)
     4//  Font: San Francisco (system fonts)
     5//
     6//  Usage:
     7//  let theme = DesignTheme.defaultLight
     8//  Text("Hello").font(theme.font(.body)).foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
     9//
    10
    11import SwiftUI
    12
    13public enum DSColorToken: String, CaseIterable {
    14  case background
    15  case foreground
    16  case card
    17  case cardforeground
    18  case popover
    19  case popoverforeground
    20  case primary
    21  case primaryforeground
    22  case secondary
    23  case secondaryforeground
    24  case muted
    25  case mutedforeground
    26  case accent
    27  case accentforeground
    28  case destructive
    29  case destructiveforeground
    30  case border
    31  case input
    32  case ring
    33  case chart1
    34  case chart2
    35  case chart3
    36  case chart4
    37  case chart5
    38  case sidebar
    39  case sidebarforeground
    40  case sidebarprimary
    41  case sidebarprimaryforeground
    42  case sidebaraccent
    43  case sidebaraccentforeground
    44  case sidebarborder
    45  case sidebarring}
    46
    47public enum DSTextStyle {
    48  case largeTitle, title1, title2, title3, headline, subheadline, body, callout, footnote, caption1, caption2
    49}
    50
    51public struct DesignTheme {
    52  public let colors: [DSColorToken: Color]
    53  public let colorScheme: ColorScheme
    54  public init(colors: [DSColorToken: Color], colorScheme: ColorScheme) {
    55    self.colors = colors
    56    self.colorScheme = colorScheme
    57  }
    58  // Color accessor
    59  public func color(_ token: DSColorToken) -> Color { colors[token] ?? .clear }
    60  // Font accessor using SF system fonts (Dynamic Type)
    61  public func font(_ style: DSTextStyle) -> Font {
    62    switch style {
    63    case .largeTitle: return .system(.largeTitle, design: .default)
    64    case .title1:     return .system(.title, design: .default)
    65    case .title2:     return .system(.title2, design: .default)
    66    case .title3:     return .system(.title3, design: .default)
    67    case .headline:   return .system(.headline, design: .default)
    68    case .subheadline:return .system(.subheadline, design: .default)
    69    case .body:       return .system(.body, design: .default)
    70    case .callout:    return .system(.callout, design: .default)
    71    case .footnote:   return .system(.footnote, design: .default)
    72    case .caption1:   return .system(.caption, design: .default)
    73    case .caption2:   return .system(size: 11, weight: .regular, design: .default)
    74    }
    75  }
    76}
    77
    78extension Color {
    79  init(hex: String) {
    80    let hex = hex.trimmingCharacters(in: CharacterSet.alphanumerics.inverted)
    81    var int: UInt64 = 0
    82    Scanner(string: hex).scanHexInt64(&int)
    83    let r = Double((int >> 16) & 0xFF) / 255.0
    84    let g = Double((int >> 8) & 0xFF) / 255.0
    85    let b = Double(int & 0xFF) / 255.0
    86    self.init(red: r, green: g, blue: b)
    87  }
    88}
    89
    90// MARK: - Theme Factories
    91
    92public extension DesignTheme {
    93  static let defaultLight = DesignTheme(colors: Self.makeColors(light: true), colorScheme: .light)
    94  static let defaultDark  = DesignTheme(colors: Self.makeColors(light: false), colorScheme: .dark)
    95
    96  private static func makeColors(light: Bool) -> [DSColorToken: Color] {
    97    let map = light ? lightHex : darkHex
    98    var out: [DSColorToken: Color] = [:]
    99    for (k, v) in map {
   100      if let token = DSColorToken(rawValue: k) {
   101        out[token] = Color(hex: v)
   102      }
   103    }
   104    return out
   105  }
   106
   107  // Raw hex dictionaries (generated)
   108  private static let lightHex: [String:String] = [
   109  "background": "#F8FAFC",
   110  "foreground": "#1E293B",
   111  "card": "#FFFFFF",
   112  "card-foreground": "#1E293B",
   113  "popover": "#FFFFFF",
   114  "popover-foreground": "#1E293B",
   115  "primary": "#6366F1",
   116  "primary-foreground": "#FFFFFF",
   117  "secondary": "#E5E7EB",
   118  "secondary-foreground": "#374151",
   119  "muted": "#F3F4F6",
   120  "muted-foreground": "#6B7280",
   121  "accent": "#E0E7FF",
   122  "accent-foreground": "#374151",
   123  "destructive": "#EF4444",
   124  "destructive-foreground": "#FFFFFF",
   125  "border": "#D1D5DB",
   126  "input": "#D1D5DB",
   127  "ring": "#6366F1",
   128  "chart-1": "#6366F1",
   129  "chart-2": "#4F46E5",
   130  "chart-3": "#4338CA",
   131  "chart-4": "#3730A3",
   132  "chart-5": "#312E81",
   133  "sidebar": "#F3F4F6",
   134  "sidebar-foreground": "#1E293B",
   135  "sidebar-primary": "#6366F1",
   136  "sidebar-primary-foreground": "#FFFFFF",
   137  "sidebar-accent": "#E0E7FF",
   138  "sidebar-accent-foreground": "#374151",
   139  "sidebar-border": "#D1D5DB",
   140  "sidebar-ring": "#6366F1"
   141]
   142  private static let darkHex: [String:String]  = [
   143  "background": "#0F172A",
   144  "foreground": "#E2E8F0",
   145  "card": "#1E293B",
   146  "card-foreground": "#E2E8F0",
   147  "popover": "#1E293B",
   148  "popover-foreground": "#E2E8F0",
   149  "primary": "#818CF8",
   150  "primary-foreground": "#0F172A",
   151  "secondary": "#2D3748",
   152  "secondary-foreground": "#D1D5DB",
   153  "muted": "#152032",
   154  "muted-foreground": "#9CA3AF",
   155  "accent": "#374151",
   156  "accent-foreground": "#D1D5DB",
   157  "destructive": "#EF4444",
   158  "destructive-foreground": "#0F172A",
   159  "border": "#4B5563",
   160  "input": "#4B5563",
   161  "ring": "#818CF8",
   162  "chart-1": "#818CF8",
   163  "chart-2": "#6366F1",
   164  "chart-3": "#4F46E5",
   165  "chart-4": "#4338CA",
   166  "chart-5": "#3730A3",
   167  "sidebar": "#1E293B",
   168  "sidebar-foreground": "#E2E8F0",
   169  "sidebar-primary": "#818CF8",
   170  "sidebar-primary-foreground": "#0F172A",
   171  "sidebar-accent": "#374151",
   172  "sidebar-accent-foreground": "#D1D5DB",
   173  "sidebar-border": "#4B5563",
   174  "sidebar-ring": "#818CF8"
   175]
   176}
   177
   178// MARK: - Example components
   179
   180public struct DSButton: View {
   181  public enum Intent { case primary, secondary, destructive }
   182  public enum Size { case s, m, l }
   183  public var title: String
   184  public var intent: Intent = .primary
   185  public var size: Size = .m
   186  public var action: () -> Void
   187
   188  @Environment(\.colorScheme) private var scheme
   189
   190  public init(_ title: String, intent: Intent = .primary, size: Size = .m, action: @escaping () -> Void) {
   191    self.title = title
   192    self.intent = intent
   193    self.size = size
   194    self.action = action
   195  }
   196
   197  private func theme(for scheme: ColorScheme) -> DesignTheme {
   198    scheme == .dark ? .defaultDark : .defaultLight
   199  }
   200
   201  public var body: some View {
   202    let theme = theme(for: scheme)
   203    Button(action: action) {
   204      Text(title)
   205        .font(theme.font(.body))
   206        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primaryforeground))
   207        .padding(.horizontal, padX)
   208        .padding(.vertical, padY)
   209        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
   210        .background(background(theme))
   211        .clipShape(RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16, style: .continuous))
   212        .shadow(color: theme.color(.ring).opacity(0.12), radius: 8, y: 4)
   213    }
   214    .accessibilityLabel(Text(title))
   215  }
   216
   217  private var padY: CGFloat { switch size { case .s: 10; case .m: 14; case .l: 18 } }
   218  private var padX: CGFloat { switch size { case .s: 12; case .m: 16; case .l: 20 } }
   219
   220  private func background(_ theme: DesignTheme) -> some View {
   221    switch intent {
   222      case .primary:    return theme.color(.primary)
   223      case .secondary:  return theme.color(.secondary)
   224      case .destructive:return theme.color(.destructive)
   225    }
   226  }
   227}
   228
   229// MARK: - SwiftUI Preview
   230
   231#if DEBUG
   232struct DesignSystem_Previews: PreviewProvider {
   233  static var previews: some View {
   234    Group {
   235      VStack(spacing: 16) {
   236        Text("Title").font(DesignTheme.defaultLight.font(.title1)).foregroundStyle(DesignTheme.defaultLight.color(.foreground))
   237        DSButton("Primary"){}
   238        DSButton("Secondary", intent: .secondary) {}
   239        DSButton("Delete", intent: .destructive) {}
   240      }
   241      .padding()
   242      .background(DesignTheme.defaultLight.color(.background))
   243
   244      VStack(spacing: 16) {
   245        Text("Title").font(DesignTheme.defaultDark.font(.title1)).foregroundStyle(DesignTheme.defaultDark.color(.foreground))
   246        DSButton("Primary"){}

    98/// Global theme configuration for Display P3 gamut support

   102  public static var useP3: Bool = {
   103    #if os(iOS)
   104    return UIScreen.main.traitCollection.displayGamut == .P3
   105    #else
   106    return false
   107    #endif
   108  }()

   115  static let defaultDark  = DesignTheme(colors: Self.makeColors(light: false), colorScheme: .dark)

   118    let map = light ? lightHex : darkHex

   122      if let token = DSColorToken(rawValue: k) {
   123        out[token] = Color(hex: v, colorSpace: colorSpace)
   124      }

   126    return out
